description: You wake up in the center of a tall grass field. Your head hurts, and you are sweating. In distance, you can see the smoke of chimneys. It appears to be a village.

After some minutes walking, you enter a small village. The people are dressed in old, ordinary clothes, some carrying bread and wood. You see a few houses with business signs. One has a bread drawn on it, another an anvil, and a third has a flask.
Inside the small wooden house, you can see dozens of types of bread. A friendly woman with an apron smiles at you. 'Hello, traveler. Are you hungry?'

options.description: Go back to the entrance of the village.
